name: openreplay-webviewer-test
description: Minimal reproduction case for OpenReplay + PDFTron WebViewer conflict

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); if (fs.existsSync('node_modules/@pdftron/webviewer/public')) { fs.cpSync('node_modules/@pdftron/webviewer/public', 'public/webviewer', { recursive: true, force: true }); }"
